announcement.goals.jester: Find and co-operate with the Killers.
announcement.goals.noellesroles.conducto: Use the master key to open up every door on the train!
announcement.role.noellesroles.the_insan: The Insane Damned Paranoid Killer Of Doom Death Destruction And Waffles
announcement.goals.noellesroles.bartende: See players that drink through walls!
announcement.goals.noellesroles.phantom: Turn invisible; but watch out for collisions.
announcement.goals.noellesroles.noisemak: Alert players of your location upon death.
announcement.goals.noellesroles.voodoo: Choose another player to go down with you.
hud.voodoo.player_deaths_only: Voodoo deaths must be triggered by another player!
announcement.goals.noellesroles.executio: Become a killer once your target dies (to a non-killer).
announcement.goals.noellesroles.recaller: Teleport to anywhere on the train!
announcement.goals.noellesroles.guesser: Guess civilian's roles to kill them instantly!
announcement.goals.noellesroles.mimic: You look like a killer cohort to other killers!
announcement.goals.noellesroles.vulture: Eat bodies to turn into a killer.
announcement.goals.noellesroles.sniper: Kill players by guessing their roles.
announcement.goals.noellesroles.troll: Use your abilities to troll the killers and help the passengers win.
announcement.goals.noellesroles.detectiv: You can investigate other players' roles.
item.noellesroles.defense_vial.tooltip:
Right click on food/drink trays to use
Clears all poison applied to trays
Protects anyone who drinks a defensed drink one extra hit of life.
Invisible to other players.
item.noellesroles.delusion_vial.tooltip:
Right click on food/drink trays to use
Creates fakes poison, making the consumer of the poisoned item
think they are poisoned, but have no physical effect.
hud.voodoo.deaths_must_be_triggered_by_a: Voodoo deaths must be triggered by another player!
tip.master_key_invisible_count: Master Keys look like lockpicks with less than %s people.
